name: Stunning Floral Invitation Set
description:
This invitation set is a jaw-dropper and sure to impress your guests with it's bold and dramatic appeal. Featured here in black with subtle purple accents. 

Price Includes (design, printing + materials): 
Customized Invitation (5x7)
Outer envelope (5.25"x7.25")
Reply Postcard (3.5 x 5)

*Printed on ivory metallic cardstock, and placed inside a coordinating black metallic envelope.

Additional Coordinating pieces are available and can be created to fit your event. Contact me and I can work up a listing just for you. Other customization also available upon request.

Please contact me if you have any questions by using the contact feature or by emailing info@redpearldesigns.com.

options.name: Paper and/or ink colors can be changed

name: Pocketfold Orchid Wedding Invitation
description:
This Wedding Invitation features a beautiful orchid moving and flowing through the design. Featured here in purple and white, but can be customized using any color combination of your choice. 

Price Includes (design, printing + materials): 
Invitations (5"x7")
Cardstock Mattings (5.25"x7.25")
RSVP Postcards (3.5"x5")
Direction Cards
Pocketfolds (5.5"x7.5")
Square Seals (2"x2") to keep Pocketfold closed 
Outer Envelopes

***Minimum order of 25 please***

*Printed on white metallic cardstock, matted with purple metallic cardstock and adhered to a gold pocketfold.

Additional Coordinating pieces are available and can be created to fit your event. Contact me and I can work up a listing just for you. Other customization also available upon request.

Please contact me if you have any questions by using the contact feature or by emailing info@redpearldesigns.com.

name: Elegant Damask Designer Wedding Invitations
description:
The damask pattern featured in this invitation gives a very elegant and contemporary feel. Your guests will be raving about these invitations!

Price Includes (design, printing + materials):
Customized Invitation with Black ink (3.4x8.75 Vertical)
Black Matting Glued to Main Invitation (4"x9.25")
Black matching exterior envelope (4.125"x9.5")
Customized Reply card Postcard with Black Ink (3.5 x 5)

***Minimum order of 25 please***

*Printed on white metallic cardstock, matted with black metallic cardstock and placed inside a coordinating black metallic envelope.

Additional Coordinating pieces are available and can be created to fit your event. Contact me and I can work up a listing just for you. Other customization also available upon request.

Please contact me if you have any questions by using the contact feature or by emailing info@redpearldesigns.com.
